news.Marktwerte Italien: Thiaw gro\u00dfer Ge: The article highlights the increasing market values of several Serie A players, including Lautaro Martínez from Inter Milan who has reached the 100-million-euro mark following a successful season. The piece also touches on the disappointing start to the season for AS Roma, resulting in a decrease in their overall market value. However, its focus on team Lazio is missing, suggesting that the team does not figure significantly in the recent market value changes in Serie A.

news.Bericht: Milan vor Verpflichtung von Che: Luka Romero, the 18-year-old talent from Lazio, is reportedly on the brink of a cost-free move to AC Milan, according to transfer expert Gianluca Di Marzio. This news comes as Milan seem to have lost out to city rivals Inter in their bid for Gladbach striker Marcus Thuram. This would be Romero's first move to a major league and forms part of a significant recruitment push from the Rossoneri ahead of the new season.

information.Player Introduction: Manuel Lazzari, the Italian dynamo, steps onto the pitch with an impressive record.

information.Birth Information: Born on the 29th of November, 1993 in the quaint town of Valdagno, Italy, Manuel's love for the beautiful game was kindled in his homeland.
information.Nationality: A true son of Italy, Lazzari wears his nationality with pride, serving as a commendable ambassador for Italian football.

news.Lazio verl\u00e4ngert vorzeitig mit Rech: Lazio Rome's right-back, Manuel Lazzari, has prematurely extended his contract with the club until 2027. Since transferring to the Biancocelesti from SPAL for 15 million euros in 2019, the 28-year-old right-footer has appeared on the field for Lazio 134 times and has contributed to 20 goals. Lazzari's current market value matches his transfer fee, a feat only surpassed by five other players at Rome.

news.Kaufoption gezogen: Abwehrchef Acerbi bl: Inter Milan has confirmed their permanent acquisition of Francesco Acerbi, having previously borrowed the defender from rivals Lazio Rome. While the exact transfer sum wasn't disclosed, it's rumored to be around 3.5 million Euros. The 35-year-old 2021 European champion, who has played a total of 353 Serie A matches, is set to continue under the guidance of his current coach Simone Inzaghi, who previously appointed Acerbi as the defensive leader at Lazio.

news.Neben Leipzig auch Atalanta, FC Sevilla: In the Europa League, Lazio's Danilo Cataldi managed to secure a draw in the 94th minute in their 2-2 match against FC Porto. 1863.transfers:
{
"Immobile's_transfer_history": [
"Immobile's transfer journey began when Juventus loaned him out to Robur Siena on July 1st, 2010. It was the first step in a career full of movement for the striker.",
"Only six months later, on January 15th, 2011, Immobile was again on the move, this time loaned out by Juventus to Grosseto.",
"In the summer of the same year, on August 18th, 2011, Immobile was sent on loan once again, this time to Pescara.",
"Immobile's first major transfer was to Genoa from Juventus in 2012 for a fee of €4M, marking his first permanent move away from Turin.",
"After a year at Genoa, Immobile returned to Juventus on July 1st, 2013, although the details of the transfer are not available.",
"Only 11 days later, on July 12th, 2013, Immobile was on the move again, transferring to Torino for €2.8M.",
"The following summer, Immobile made a big move to Germany, joining Borussia Dortmund from Torino on July 1st, 2014 for a significant fee of €19.5M.",
"However, his time in Dortmund was short-lived as he was loaned to Sevilla on July 12th, 2015.",
"Immobile's tour of Europe continued as Sevilla permanently signed him from Borussia Dortmund for €11M on January 13th, 2016.",
"A day later, on January 14th, 2016, Immobile was loaned back to his former club Torino from Sevilla.",
"Further movement ensued on July 1st, 2016, when Sevilla loaned Immobile back to Torino although the details of this transfer remain undisclosed.",
"Finally, on July 27th, 2016, Immobile made the move to Lazio from Sevilla for an €8.5M fee, where he has since become a key player for the Roman outfit." 
]
}

news.Auto st\u00f6\u00dft mit Tram zusammen:: Lazio's captain, Ciro Immobile, was involved in a car collision with a tram in Rome while driving with his daughters. Immobile suffered from a whiplash injury and a broken rib and is currently under observation at the hospital, though his condition is stable. While there is no definite timeframe for his return to action, experts suggest that recovery could take up to two weeks if the rib break is complete.

news.Lazios h\u00f6chste Abl\u00f6se des Somm: Lazio Rome has confirmed the signing of Croatian player, Toma Bašić, from Girondins Bordeaux. The central midfielder has signed a contract with the Biancocelesti until 2026, costing the Italians a base fee of 7 million euros, which can increase by another million through bonus payments. This makes it Lazio's third seven-figure transfer this summer and the highest that the Romains have spent on a player for the new season.

In the league, they have completed a total of 38 fixtures, 19 each played home and away. Their win ratio has been commendable with 26 wins, 12 at home and 14 away. news.Nach Wett-Sperre: Newcastle erw\u00e4gt: Sporting Director of Newcastle United, Dan Ashworth, revealed the shock at a sudden 10-month ban for their £64 million summer acquisition, Sandro Tonali, who was found guilty of sports betting on illegal websites during his tenure at AC Milan and Brescia Calcio. The 23-year-old midfielder will now be absent until the end of August 2024, missing the European Championships should Italy qualify. Ashworth spoke about possibly finding a replacement for Tonali during the winter, the legal implications of the transfer, and his self-doubt over the situation.

news.Nach Wett-Sperre: Newcastle erw\u00e4gt: Young Italian midfielder Sandro Tonali, who recently signed for Newcastle United for £64 million, has been hit with an unexpected ten-month ban for participating in sports betting on illegal websites while at AC Milan and Brescia Calcio. This suspension will rule him out of play until the end of August 2024, and potentially the European Championship should Italy qualify. Newcastle's sporting director, Dan Ashworth, expressed shock at the revelation but reaffirmed the club's support for Tonali, stating the club will be considering possible replacements during the upcoming winter transfer window.

information.Player_Nationality: Proudly representing his home country, Sweden, his nationality is a testament to his formidable gameplay.
information.Player_Physical_Attributes: Standing tall at 195 cm and weighing 95 kg, Ibrahimović's physical presence on the field is truly impressive.

fixture.information:
Welcome to our recap of the match played on September 12, 2021, at the impressive Stadio Giuseppe Meazza. Referee D. Chiffi had the pleasure of overseeing this compelling fixture between AC Milan and Lazio, as part of the Regular Season's 3rd round.

It was AC Milan who emerged victorious, their fortress at the Stadio Giuseppe Meazza proving an insurmountable challenge for Lazio. The final whistle indicated the end of a thrilling game, with AC Milan securing a 2-0 win after 90 minutes of playtime. 

With a 1-0 scoreline at half-time, the Rossoneri only fortified their position in the second half, adding another goal to secure the win. Lazio, unfortunately, couldn't break through Milan's defenses and failed to register a goal in their column. There was no need for extra time or penalty shootouts in this encounter, as the home team won decisively within regulation time.

The result not only brought joy to the AC Milan fans but also added three valuable points to their league tally. This was football at its finest, a game to be remembered, and a testament to the prowess of AC Milan. Stay tuned for more exciting updates from the world of football.

venue: "Ladies and gentlemen, we find ourselves today at the iconic Stadio Giuseppe Meazza, tucked away in the heart of Milano at Via Piccolomini 5. A grand colosseum of football, this arena boasts an impressive capacity of over 80,000 spectators, all ready to be a part of an unforgettable football encounter. The lush green grass surface of the pitch, impeccably maintained, always adds an extra dash of excitement to the games played here. Soak up the atmosphere, it's promising to be a cracker of a match."
